attributes.action: Relax the criteria for Christian based organisations to receive public funding for their community support programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Considering that the vast majority of Christian church promoted community activity is borne out of a genuine sense of love to their fellow neighbours and their community arm's are stretched out of pure motives, wouldn't it make sense for the government to make it easier for this fantastic, free and peaceloving body of volunteers to receive funds to carry out their work more effectively.
